headline: A Look At Builders FirstSource (BLDR) Valuation After Recent Share Price Moves
summary: Builders FirstSource (BLDR) has drawn investor interest after recent trading left the shares at a last close of $111.26, with mixed return patterns across the past week, month, past 3 months and year. See our latest analysis for Builders FirstSource. The recent 1-day share price return of 2.60% and 7-day share price return of 7.82% at a share price of $111.26 sit against a year-to-date share price return of 6.34%.
